thumb.name: Happy Gift Giving
thumb.verse: %3CB%3EGift tags%3C/B%3E will add a charming touch to all your packages!%3CBR%3E%3CBR%3E%3CB%3EYou'll need:%3C/B%3E A4 Paper.%3CBR%3E%3CBR%3E%3CB%3EDirections:%3C/B%3E%3CBR%3E%3CBR%3E%3COL%3E%3CLI%3EClick on %3CB%3EPersonalise and Print Your Project%3C/B%3E to open the Create %26 Print workspace.%3C/LI%3E%3CLI%3EMake text changes as desired.%3C/LI%3E%3CLI%3EClick %3CB%3EPrint Project%3C/B%3E to send finished Gift Tag to the printer.%3C/LI%3E%3CLI%3E%3CB%3ECut%3C/B%3E along solid lines.%3C/LI%3E%3CLI%3E%3CB%3EFold%3C/B%3E along dotted lines (if applicable).%3C/LI%3E%3CLI%3ETo make matching envelope (if applicable) with design side facing down, fold up flaps along dotted lines. Tape or glue bottom and side flaps to secure.%3C/LI%3E%3CLI%3EFor hanging Gift Tags carefully cut or punch out the hole at the top.%3C/LI%3E%3CLI%3E%3CB%3ETie%3C/B%3E a string or ribbon through the hole.%3C/LI%3E%3C/OL%3E%3CB%3ETips:%3C/B%3E%3CBR%3E%3CBR%3EPrint your project on scrap paper first to check the alignment, spelling and overall look of the project. A Gift Tag can be used instead of or in addition to a greeting card.

thumb.name: Reindeer Wishes
thumb.verse: %3CB%3EGift tags%3C/B%3E will add a charming touch to all your packages!%3CBR%3E%3CBR%3E%3CB%3EYou'll need:%3C/B%3E A4 Paper.%3CBR%3E%3CBR%3E%3CB%3EDirections:%3C/B%3E%3CBR%3E%3CBR%3E%3COL%3E%3CLI%3EClick on %3CB%3EPersonalise and Print Your Project%3C/B%3E to open the Create %26 Print workspace.%3C/LI%3E%3CLI%3EMake text changes as desired.%3C/LI%3E%3CLI%3EClick %3CB%3EPrint Project%3C/B%3E to send finished Gift Tag to the printer.%3C/LI%3E%3CLI%3E%3CB%3ECut%3C/B%3E along solid lines.%3C/LI%3E%3CLI%3E%3CB%3EFold%3C/B%3E along dotted lines (if applicable).%3C/LI%3E%3CLI%3ETo make matching envelope (if applicable) with design side facing down. fold up flaps along dotted lines. Tape or glue bottom and side flaps to secure.%3C/LI%3E%3CLI%3EFor hanging Gift Tags carefully cut or punch out the hole at the top.%3C/LI%3E%3CLI%3E%3CB%3ETie%3C/B%3E a string or ribbon through the hole.%3C/LI%3E%3C/OL%3E%3CB%3ETips:%3C/B%3E%3CBR%3E%3CBR%3EPrint your project on scrap paper first to check the alignment, spelling and overall look of the project. A Gift Tag can be used instead of or in addition to a greeting card.
